meanings.definition: Full of vigor and spirit; courageous
meanings.sent1: The mettlesome knight fearlessly faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She showed her mettlesome nature by standing up for what she believed in.
meanings.sent3: The mettlesome puppy bravely barked at the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: Her mettlesome attitude shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The mettlesome firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.definition: Having a high level of determination and resilience
meanings.sent1: Despite the challenges, she remained mettlesome in achieving her goals.
meanings.sent2: The team's mettlesome spirit helped them overcome the tough competition.
meanings.sent3: The mettlesome student refused to give up on solving the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her mettlesome perseverance inspired others to keep going.
meanings.sent5: The mettlesome athlete pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
